name: B By Beat
description:
This game is about the story of a robot who was helping with the study of a wormhole in an unknown space-time pocket.

You realize that you can dash forward with your own thoughts in this place.
But you are scared and lonely. This is because you can feel and hear so many strange monsters.
You play the music that researchers used to listen to in your head.
Maybe it'll be okay.

Find the alive BPM.
Go back to your friends.
This is not a mission.
This is just what you really want.

team Gingermoon
